document_data.name: Zaheb al-Zidq
document_data.titles: the Righteous One, His Most Respected Majesty and Puissant Hetmen of the Mighty Khan
document_data.mainbody: '''Zaheb al-Zidq''' was a [[noble dao]] inhabiting [[Ajayib]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Despite being a mighty noble among the [[dao]], Zaheb was madly in love with the Calipha of Ajayib, [[Halima al-Wahsi]]. He spent most of his time at Halima's side, hoping to win her affections.
document_data.Relationships: Aside from driving off other potential suitors, it seemed that all of Zaheb's efforts were wasted since the Calipha viewed him as a favorite pet and nothing more.
